values: Exposition or Imposition? How Gospel-Centered Preaching Can Go WrongExposition or Imposition? How Gospel-Centered Preaching Can Go Wrong

Preachers, instead of taking your text and making a beeline to the cross, take the cross and make a beeline to your text.Preachers, instead of taking your text and making a beeline to the cross, take the cross and make a beeline to your text.
